name: Ink Brawlers
description:
Why do we get Tattoos?

We get tattoos to remember, to preserve, to love, to forgive, not to forget where we came from or where we are... 

Ink brawlers is a reminder of the power of collective memory, a fun way to learn more about different cultures, their art, amazing places, and historical dates. Collect tattoos from all around the world, acquire power, challenge other brawlers and become the real memory Keeper.
